column2: '''Par-A-Dice Hotel and Casino''' is a casino located on the [[Illinois River]] off [[Illinois Route 116]]/[[U.S. Route 150]] in [[East Peoria, Illinois|East Peoria]], [[Illinois]], [[United States]].

column1: Blue Chip Casino, Hotel and Spa
column2: '''Blue Chip Casino, Hotel and Spa''' is a [[riverboat casino]] located in [[Michigan City, Indiana]].<ref>[http://nwitimes.com/entertainment/article_dc171484-2acd-56b5-a961-abc54da9203b.html Northwest Indiana Times: Blue Chip Casino gets winning expansion]</ref> It is owned by [[Boyd Gaming]].
column5: 777 Blue Chip Drive, Michigan City, Indiana 46360

column2: '''Apple Valley Inn''' was a hotel and restaurant established in [[Apple Valley, California]], to help developer [[Newton T. Bass]] attract wealthy land buyers to the southern California desert town. Bass and partner Bernard \Bud\" Westlund owned Apple Valley Ranchos Land Development Co.<ref>http://archive.vvdailypress.com/2005/11187535765800.html{{dead link|date=October 2016 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }}</ref>"
column20: Hotels in California;Buildings and structures in San Bernardino County, California;Victor Valley;Hotel buildings completed in 1948;Hotels established in 1948

column2: '''The Lakefront Anchorage Hotel''', formerly known as '''The Millennium Alaska Hotel,''' is the only lakeside hotel in Anchorage situated on the shores of scenic Lake Hood, one mile from [[Anchorage International Airport]] and four miles from downtown [[Anchorage]]. The Lakefront Anchorage Hotel is operated as part of the [[Millennium & Copthorne Hotels]] chain. It has 248 guest rooms,<ref>{{cite web|url = http://www.millenniumhotels.com/millenniumanchorage/index.html|title = About The Lakefront Anchorage Hotel's Guest Rooms|accessdate = 2009-04-19|url-status = dead|archiveurl = https://web.archive.org/web/20090420080212/http://www.millenniumhotels.com/millenniumanchorage/index.html|archivedate = 2009-04-20}}</ref> laundry services, multiple meeting and events facilities, exercise room,  and 2 restaurants known as \The Flying Machine\"
column5: and the \"Fancy Moose Lounge\" which serves lunch and dinner all year long. During the summer months they open up the deck area for guest to sit and dine
column6: all while watching the float planes fly by."

column1: Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Hollywood
column2: '''Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Hollywood''', also known as '''The Guitar Hotel''', due to its tower constructed to resemble a [[Gibson Les Paul]] guitar, is a [[hotel]] and [[casino]] resort near [[Hollywood, Florida]], [[United States]], located on {{convert|100|acre}} of the [[Hollywood Reservation]] of the [[Seminole Tribe of Florida]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.ictv1.com/hardrockhotelandcasino/index2.html |title=Fact Sheet |website=Ictv1.com |access-date=11 August 2010}}</ref> The property currently has three hotel towers, a {{convert|140000|sqft|abbr=on}} casino, large poker room, a {{convert|4|acre|abbr=on|adj=on}} lagoon-style pool facility with a center bar and many private restaurants, shops, spa, cabanas, bars and nightclubs, and the Hard Rock Event Center.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.seminolehardrockhollywood.com/dining-restaurants.htm|title=Dining & Restaurants - Seminole Hard Rock Hollywood|website=Seminolehardrockhollywood.com|access-date=30 December 2018}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.seminolehardrockhollywood.com/nightlife-and-entertainment.htm|title=Nightlife & Entertainment - Seminole Hard Rock Hollywood|website=Seminolehardrockhollywood.com|access-date=30 December 2018}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.seminolehardrockhollywood.com/hard-rock-live.htm |title=Hard Rock Event Center Concerts & Shows |website=seminolehardrockhollywood.com |access-date=June 19, 2019}}</ref> A large expansion was completed in October 2019.<ref name=TheNew>{{cite web |url=https://www.seminolehardrockhollywood.com/the-new-hard-rock.htm |title=The New Hard Rock |website=seminolehardrockhollywood.com |access-date=June 19, 2019}}</ref>
column6: May 1, 2004<ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.newspapers.com/clip/17966737/tribe_opens_hard_rock_casino/ |title=Tribe opens Hard Rock casino |agency=[[Associated Press|AP]] |newspaper=[[Florida Today]] |location=[[Cocoa, Florida]] |date=May 1, 2004 |access-date=March 3, 2018 |via=newspapers.com}}</ref>
